content: Is there a convenient way I could disable default match bindings for a specific StmtKind::Local? Even a hacky way to do this for the time being, just to do some testing (in the context of #71156). I'm not sure who's most familiar with this code now.
@varkor I know the code reasonably well
I don't imagine it'd be too hard
but you'll have to moify the code
so I guess it depends on your def'n of convenient
iirc there is some amount of information that gets passed donw in the check_pattern code or whatever it's called
